headline: Lam Research (LRCX): Examining Valuation After a Strong Year-to-Date Rally
summary: Lam Research (LRCX) has been catching the eye of investors lately, as shares have seen double-digit growth over the past month. The company’s recent momentum comes amid a broader wave of interest in the semiconductor sector. See our latest analysis for Lam Research. This latest surge follows a truly impressive run for Lam Research, with its share price notching a 109.4% gain year-to-date and a total shareholder return of nearly 97.3% over the past twelve months.
